libsource.description:
RS232 Transceiver This part covers 232 drivers that are compatible with the MAX3232. Sipex SP3232EB Datasheet

SparkFun Products

  • SOIC component (COM-00589 / IC-08171)
  • Retired DIP component (COM-00316 / IC-08446)
  • SparkFun Transceiver Breakout - MAX3232 (BOB-11189)
  • SparkFun XBee Explorer Serial (WRL-13225)

Momentary Switch (Pushbutton) - SPST Normally-open (NO) SPST momentary switches (buttons, pushbuttons).

Variants

PTH-12MM - 12mm square, through-hole
  • Momentary Pushbutton Switch - 12mm Square (COM-09190)
PTH-6.0MM, PTH-6.0MM-KIT - 6.0mm square, through-hole
  • Mini Pushbutton Switch (COM-00097)
  • KIT package intended for soldering kit's - only one side of pads' copper is exposed.
PTH-RIGHT-ANGLE-KIT - Right-angle, through-hole
  • Right Angle Tactile Button - Used on SparkFun BigTime Watch Kit
SMD-12MM - 12mm square, surface-mount
  • Tactile Button - SMD (12mm) (COM-12993)
  • Used on SparkFun PicoBoard
SMD-4.5MM - 4.5mm Square Trackball Switch
  • Used on SparkFun Blackberry Trackballer Breakout
SMD-4.6MMX2.8MM - 4.60mm x 2.80mm, surface mount
  • Used on SparkFun SAMD21 Mini Breakout
SMD-5.2MM, SMD-5.2-REDUNDANT - 5.2mm square, surface-mount
  • Mini Pushbutton Switch - SMD (COM-08720)
  • Used on Arduino Pro Mini
  • REDUNDANT package connects both switch circuits together
SMD-6.0X3.5MM - 6.0 x 3.5mm, surface mount
  • Momentary Reset Switch SMD (COM-08229)
SMD-6.2MM-TALL - 6.2mm square, surface mount
  • Tactile Button - SMD (6mm)
  • Used on SparkFun Digital Sandbox
SMD-RIGHT-ANGLE - Right-angle, surface mount
  • Used on SparkFun Block for Intel Edison - Arduino

STM32 Black Pill part like ; broken out SWD pins ; not KLC compliant
I2C Serial EEPROM, 32Kb (4096x8) with Unique Serial Number, SO8
Generic connector, single row, 01x06, script generated (kicad-library-utils/schlib/autogen/connector/)

libpart.description: Generic connector, single row, 01x06, script generated (kicad-library-utils/schlib/autogen/connector/)
